info.desc: This is Heritage Hall on level 1. It should be on your right.
info.instr: Starting on the first floor of McNamara, make your way to the north side of the building where Heritage Hall is.

info.desc: This hallway that leads to a pair of elevators should then be on your left, there's also stairs.
info.instr: There will then be elevators to your left (with Heritage Hall on your right), take them down to the lowest level.

info.desc: This is the doorway to University Ave Parking Garage
info.instr: You will exit into a study area where you will head in a straight path NW
The end is at the doors labelled University Ave Parking Garage
